original_text: At that time, the apostles were doing many miracles that showed God's power among the people. All the believers often met together in the yard of the temple in a place called Solomon's porch.
korean_text: 사도들의 손을 통하여 민간에 표적과 기사가 많이 일어나매 믿는 사람이 다 마음을 같이하여 솔로몬 행각에 모이고

sentences.original_text: the apostles were doing many miracles
All the believers often met together
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 믿는 사람들이 자주 함께 모였다

sentences.original_text: in the yard of the temple
in a place called Solomon's porch
